name: Prototype A (Kimiyam)
description:
OK! App

This wellbeing app provides a system that should help people track their physical and/or mental wellbeing and encourage them to care for their bodies and minds and their eating habits.

This application provides a unique plan for each day depending on the user's needs. The user has the ability to adjust the app to focus more on the upcoming topics when signing up: mindful activities, physical activities, improving eating habits. The home page you are testing is mostly focused on mindful activities.

Estimated time for users to test and fill the questionnaire: 7 - 10 minutes

What to test

Through A/B testing, you are going to test the home page of OK! App. Therefore, other functions of this app are disabled.

Task

Check out the activity named “5-minute bedtime story” and make a progress in your ring. 

Other activities are also available to test. However, It is your choice to explore all the activities or not. Stop whenever you feel like it.

Please keep that in mind you are not going to be able to see the progress in your ring visually and it is going to repeat 80% progress after each activity. However, in the final product, you will be able to see your progress after each activity in your ring. 

What to do after the test

Please fill out the following questionnaire according to your experience. 

Click here to view the questionnaire

Thank you for your time!
